name: Battle For Vera
storyline:
Planet Vera.
Discovered in 2655 A.D.
Only source of Veritium, a rare liquid substance, coveted for its energy properties.
This discovery ignited a new era of interstellar conflict.
Powerful factions vied for control, triggering a battle for supremacy.
Your choice will shape the destiny of Vera and its most precious resource.
summary: Battle for Vera is a Real-Time Strategy game that draws inspiration from beloved classics, and improves upon many of their ideas to create an exciting new experience.
